experiment_difficulties: AutoComPaste is a laudable initiative with potential to help in the future. Right now it resembles poorly formatted grammar help coded hastily. The spaces before and after question marks etc. Takes a bit getting used to.
experiment_feedback:
Keep up the good work. Id use this in the future if it were cleaner. Im not a coder, but it seems "buggy"/glitchy? 
Wouldnt fly in the Apple App store.
